meanings.sent1: I will be resubmitting my homework after making corrections.
meanings.sent2: She resubmitted her job application to the company.
meanings.sent3: The teacher asked for resubmitting the test, but with a smile.
meanings.sent4: He kept resubmitting his ideas until they were finally accepted.
meanings.sent5: The student was resubmitting his project with determination.

meanings.sent1: The customer is resubmitting the faulty product for a refund.
meanings.sent2: They resubmitted the proposal to the committee for review.
meanings.sent3: The cat kept resubmitting the same toy mouse to its owner.
meanings.sent4: The email system was resubmitting messages due to a technical glitch.
meanings.sent5: The detective was resubmitting evidence to the lab for further analysis.
